


<!-- @namespace    sugar.js.is -->

# ```js isUrl ```


Check if the passed value is a valid url

## Parameters

- **value**  Mixed: The value to check



## Example (js)

```js
import isUrl from '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/is/url';
isUrl('http://google.com') => true
isUrl('ftp://web.coco.com:2222') => true
isUrl('hello') => false
```
